name: Optum Bank - Financial
description: Optum Bank is a Utah-chartered, FDIC-insured financial institution specializing in health-focused consumer banking and benefits administration. Founded in 2003 in Salt Lake City as an industrial loan corporation originally named Exante Bank, the organization rebranded to OptumHealth Bank in 2008 and adopted its current name, Optum Bank, in 2012. Today, it operates as a subsidiary of Optum Health Financial Services.
